info.author: thimios katsoulis
info.description:
Madpy is a cms built on top of apache , mod_python , postgresql , cheetah
templates. Features: Clean urls , support for creating content in more than one
language , Object oriented design , MVC like mechanism.
info.name: Madpy
info.html_description: Madpy is a cms built on top of apache , mod_python , postgresql , cheetah templates. Features: Clean urls , support for creating content in more than one language , Object oriented design , MVC like mechanism.
